text:
I don't mean to be rude or disrespectful but I find your response irrelevant and borderline arrogant because I asked for your help since dennis is always tagging you and the only thing you did is tell me you don't have time to teach me about something that I didn't even ask for in the first place.

Anyway,
I do understand it and I already have an application turning that takes in webhooks coming from HubSpot and does whatever it does.
The app has been authenticated and I have my token and all the scopes needed.

It's just that in the docs, once I get my token, I need to do the following "Call the PUT <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/extensions/accounting/user-account> endpoint with the OAuth access token that you just received, providing us with information about the account in your system that was connected with that Auth token."
And why I do that, and I provide the necessary info, which is the accountId ( Or quickbooks company id), the request returns a 404 response and just don't know why :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U26BLKGE4> Just letting you know this worked for me too. Thank you!

Hi all, is it possible to do a user registration in HubSpot? I want to make a login page and save data for users like “liked recipes” and some other user related details. Is this possible?
Thanks alot!
